entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:10 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:10 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
